LearningProgramPlan.name: LearningProgramPlan
LearningProgramPlan.description: Represents details of a plan thatâ€™s created to execute a Learning Program.

ActiveFromDate.description: The date the Learning Program Plan became active.

ActiveToDate.description: The date after which the Learning Program Plan is inactive.

Description.description: Description of the Learning Program Plan.

DraftPlanContent.description: The draft content related to the Learning Program Plan saved by the user in the Program Plan Builder. For example, a draft about Learning Program Plan Requirements, Learning Achievements, and so on.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the Learning Program Plan is active or not.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningProgramId.description: The Learning Program associated with the Learning Program Plan.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

MinimumProgramGradePointAvg.description: The minimum cumulative GPA that's required to complete the program.

Name.description: The name of the Learning Program Plan.

ProviderId.description: The Account of the institution that provides the Learning Program Plan.

VersionNumber.description: Specifies the version of the Learning Program Plan.
